class.name: ResultTemplateEntity
class.comment: Table to store resultTemplates (OGC SOS 2.0 result handling profile). Mapping file: sos/core/ResultTemplate.hbm.xml

column.name: fk_offering_id
column.comment: Foreign Key (FK) to the related offering. Contains "offering".id

column.name: fk_phenomenon_id
column.comment: Foreign Key (FK) to the related observableProperty. Contains "phenomenon".Id

column.name: fk_procedure_id
column.comment: Foreign Key (FK) to the related procedure. Contains "procedure".id

column.name: fk_feature_id
column.comment: Foreign Key (FK) to the related featureOfInterest. Contains "feature".id

column.name: identifier
column.comment: The resultTemplate identifier, required for InsertResult requests.

column.name: structure
column.comment: The resultStructure as XML string. Describes the types and order of the values in a GetResultResponse/InsertResultRequest

column.name: encoding
column.comment: The resultEncoding as XML string. Describes the encoding of the values in a GetResultResponse/InsertResultRequest
